title: record games
body:
Hey fellows! 
Is there an option to record games? Because i have my main champs but sometimes there are players that are diamond or something like that and to be honest they are really good and i would like to record the game to watch it afterwards and observe there skills. So if anyone could help me out with that it would be grweat. Thanks :)

replies.body:
http://www.leaguelsi.com/

Have Fun.

Next Time, post in the english boards.
